Leon Botha (ubochí ànó n'ọnwa Juun 1985 rụọ úbọchị isé n'ọnwa Juun 2011) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme egwuregwu diski na South Africa
A maara ya màkà mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na otu hip hop Die Antwoord, yana ịbụ otu n'ime ndị nwere progeria ogologo ógè n'ụwa.
A mụrụ Botha na Cape Town, South Africa, ma biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa progeria mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ
O nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla na nka karịa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tygerberg Art Centre, mana ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-ese  ógè niile mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na-arụ ọrụ ndị e nyere iwu.
N'afọ 2005, a wara Botha ahụ nkè ọma n'obi iji gbochie nkụchi obi n'ihi atherosclerosis metụtara progeria.

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi mbụ nke Who Am I? Transgressions, mmekọrịta foto ya na Gordon Clark, na João Ferreira Gallery na Cape Town. Botha kwùrù banyéré ihe ngosi ahụ, "Abụ m ónyé ime mmụọ, otu gị, n'ụzọ bụ isi
Mgbè ahụ abụ m mmadụ na akụkụ a nke mmadụ bụ ahụ, nke nwéré ọnọdụ

Botha na-etinye áká na deejaying na turntablism n'okpuru áhà DJ Solarize.Kpọpụta njehie: Invalid <ref> tag; refs with no name must have content E gosipụtara ya na Watkin Tudor Jones, aka Ninja, na vidiyo egwu "Enter the Ninja" site na Die AntwoordKpọpụta njehie: Invalid <ref> tag; refs with no name must have content

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010, Botha nwèrè ọrịa strok. Botha nwụrụ site na nsogbụ nke progeria na Cape Town otu ụbọchị mgbè ọ gachara afọ iri abụọ na isii.Kpọpụta njehie: Invalid <ref> tag; refs with no name must have content
Botha bụ ihe kpaliri otu ihe nkiri Solarize, nkè Marcin Stańczyk, nkè Andrzej Szpindler dere, nke malitere na Warsaw n'ọnwa Eprel 2014 na Teatr Wielki, Polish National Opera.
